@description.name: @description
@description.body: This class is responsible for checking the operating systems name. This class is used by {@link qx.core.Environment} and should not be used directly. Please check its class comment for details how to use it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks for the name of the operating system.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The name of the operating system.
@return.description: The name of the operating system.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Maps user agent names to system IDs

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks for the version of the operating system using the internal map.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{String} The version as strin or an empty string if the version
   could not be detected.
@return.description:
The version as strin or an empty string if the version
   could not be detected.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: userAgent {String} userAgent parameter, needed for detection.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} version number as string or null.
@return.description: version number as string or null.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: userAgent {String} userAgent parameter, needed for detection.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} version number as string or null.
@return.description: version number as string or null.
